title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into the Best of The Herd Podcast with Colin Cowherd! Colin doesn't believe the win last night for the Miami Dolphins proves they're not sustainable. Russell Westbrook has shown exactly what he can do for the past thirteen years but apparently the Lakers never checked his resume. We complain way too much as Americans, nobody's perfect, the referees are not deciding games. Take away the best and worst games from Justin Herbert and you're left with what he really is. Plus, another riveting edition of "Herd Hierarchy!"


Guest: Mark Sanchez

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
